creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: abstract watercolor in bright hues; red/purple UR; green/red UL; blue/purple LL; brown/yellow LR
inscription:
Signature, Date, Label

-- in graphite on verso, upper left: 493 Torson 
-- in graphite on verso, lower left: 0486

Two labels on back of frame:
-- Art Lending Service of the Museum of Modern Art -21 W. 53 Street, N.Y. / No. LS 596-471 / Artist NAY / Title COMPOSITION / medium watercolor.  [... -2 mos.]  [...mos.] [...rson]
-- John E. Andrus, III 100 Bushaway Road, Wayzata, Minn. / Nay watercolour / Composition
signed: signed and dated in graphite, lower right: [Nay 58]
title: Composition
